speaker: Card Table
lines: You sit at the card table as a fresh hand is dealt.
A coin wobbles and settles near the pot.
'Stories or silver,' says a woman, smiling.
The deck smells faintly of smoke.
A spoon taps a glass; you are in the next round.
A dog under the table watches your hands.
You choose how to play it.

choices.text: Lose gracefully and buy a round.
Accuse a cheat and flip the table.
